title: My Pixel 3 XL won't turn on, tried everything was told, unresponsive
content: So this phone has been quite a problem since i bought it (last end of year), lately it become increasingly more unstable with charging issue, so 2 weeks ago thats when it totally not responsive its charger (while i check the charger have no problem delivering power to other phone), it responds to other charger adapter (but the power won't go up), and I've tried everything that mentioned, just won't turn on.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
